data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ripka, Géza (2016): A new Aceria species (Acari: Prostigmata: Eriophyoidea) from Minuartia frutescens (Caryophyllaceae) in Hungary. Zootaxa 4189 (1): 165-173, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.1.9|4 occurrences
